meanings.definition: To connect or link together in a chain or series.
meanings.sent1: She interchains the colorful beads to make a bracelet.
meanings.sent2: The workers interchains the fence pieces to build a boundary.
meanings.sent3: The magician interchains the rings in a mesmerizing trick.
meanings.sent4: His words interchains our hearts, creating a bond of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The artist interchains different shapes to form a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A series of interconnected chains or links.
meanings.sent1: The interchains of the necklace shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent2: The old bridge was supported by sturdy interchains.
meanings.sent3: The interchains of the swing creaked as the children played.
meanings.sent4: The interchains of fate brought them together in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The interchains of the music box played a soothing melody.
